snippet: Daybees lets people fine-tune searches for things to do, using keywords, location or time and date.
abstract: Start-up search engine Daybees aims to outperform Google in providing accurate results for local events; company is among growing number of 'vertical' search engines that hope to carve out niche in lucrative online search business; Daybees is live in Britain, with plans to expand to the United States and other countries.
lead_paragraph: Daybees lets people fine-tune searches for things to do, using keywords, location or time and date.

headline.seo: Daybees Aspires to Be the Google of Event Search Sites
headline.main: Seeking to Outdo Google in Searching for Events
headline.print_headline:
Seeking to Outdo Google
In Searching for Events
